subject: Hockey, Ice
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Colorado chose Nathan MacKinnon with the first pick in the N.H.L. draft, while Seth Jones, who grew up admiring the Avalanche, slid to fourth.
snippet: Colorado chose Nathan MacKinnon with the first pick in the N.H.L. draft, while Seth Jones, who grew up admiring the Avalanche, slid to fourth.
